name: StressScreeningAssessmentsAndQuestions
title: Stress Screening Assessments And Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessments and questions for Stress as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessments or questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses  for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessments and questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

contains.display: PhenX - perceived stress protocol 180801
In the last month, how often have you been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly
In the last month, how often have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life
In the last month, how often have you felt nervous and stressed
In the last month, how often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems
In the last month, how often have you felt that things were going your way
In the last month, how often have you found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do
In the last month, how often have you been able to control irritations in your life
In the last month, how often have you felt that you were on top of things
In the last month, how often have you been angered because of things that were outside of your control
In the last month, how often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them
How much stress have you been experiencing in the past week, including today # [SAMHSA]
Core behavioral and psychosocial data elements for the electronic health record [SAMHSA]
Do you feel stress - tense, restless, nervous, or anxious, or unable to sleep at night because your mind is troubled all the time - these days [OSQ]
Social, psychological and behavioral observations - 2015 Edition Health IT Certification Criteria set
General Well-Being Schedule - 18 item [NHANES]
Have you been under or felt you were under any strain, stress, or pressure during the past month [NHANES]
Protocol for Responding to and Assessing Patients' Assets, Risks, and Experiences [PRAPARE]
Stress level
Do you often feel under extreme stress Caregiver [SEEK]
Safe Environment for Every Kid parent questionnaire - revised [SEEK] Caregiver
